title: Please help me to identify a font
content:
Please help me to identify the font of this picture, I'd really appreciate if you help me. thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Captura_6428.PNG)
author: darioalejo87

comments.content:
Can't recognize it either. Reminds me of [Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad) but that's clearly not it.  
More alternatives: [Whitney](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/whitney/overview), [Underground P22](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro), [Museo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/museo-sans), [Source Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211054429/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/source-sans-pro)
